# [Interview #826: Mistborn: The Final Empire Annotations, Entry #179](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=826#179)

#### [Brandon Sanderson (Chapter 37 Part 2)](http://brandonsanderson.com/annotation-mistborn-chapter-thirty-seven-part-two/)

Sazed's doings here are our first real glimpse of Feruchemy in action. It's a fun magic system—you'll see a lot more of it in book two.
